website_summaries.verdict: This dry kibble is formulated for kittens and young cats, but may also work for older cats with digestive issues.
pros: Nutritional profile similar to mother's milk
Contains DHA for brain and vision development
Easy for kittens and young cats to digest
cons: Kibble size varies from bag to bag
Grain and corn-based formula may not be super healthful

customer_reviews.title: Copper Loves It!!
customer_reviews.text: I acquired a 6 week old kitten that my neighbor found in her garage in mid July. I've trusted Purina when I had dogs and so I got Purina Kitten Chow for Copper. She eats it up!! My Veterinarian says she is gaining weight appropriately and seems very healthy. As you can see, she even stands in a wet sink to eat it! lol P.S.- Please don't tell her she's a cat. She thinks she's a Greyhound Dog/Mountain Goat mix disguised as a stubby tailed, split-faced torti rofl! Must go fast, must climb high!!
customer_reviews.author: Tia Deb

customer_reviews.title: Buy if you have hair ball prone cats!
customer_reviews.text: I used to feed my cats adult cat food by Purina. I have long haired cats that frequently got hair balls, even though I brushed them and gave them hair ball reducing treats. I switched them to this because of the ingredients and high oil content. In the first week my cats were hacking up nasty hair balls but afterwards they stopped. It's been months and my cats are healthier and have shiny coats. Plus they're not hacking up hair balls!!!
customer_reviews.author: Artemisia

customer_reviews.title: Over 20 years of using this brand for kittens
customer_reviews.text: The kittens love love love their food. It’s been hard taking them off and moving them into an adult food because they reject so many kinds. However I keep a bag of kitten chow as their ‘treats’ and they go wild when it’s snack time! Boys- 2 and 1. The 2 year old loves when you throw them and he plays catch. My senior cat loves them too and I think it’s part of a healthy diet for her sensitive teeth due to the small pieces she can eat easier.
customer_reviews.author: C. P.

customer_reviews.title: Only food my picky cat will eat
customer_reviews.text: I've gone through so many expensive cat foods only to arrive at this affordable choice. Better said, my cat made this choice. She loves it. Easy for her to digest and keeps her weight steady. She is 100% house cat and this food keeps her regular without irregular, stinky bowel movements..not a pleasant subject but a real concern for cat owners. I love my cat and I want the best for her. How nice to find an affordable cat food that she loves and that is good for her. She is about one year old and I plan on making this one her food for years to come..
customer_reviews.author: suzyq

customer_reviews.title: The kittens love the food but, check it first
customer_reviews.text: The kittens like the food and everything was great until I started noticing molded pieces. Then....a Giant chunk of molded food fell out of the bag. After some inspection the entire bottom layer was an inch thick of molded food. I want to make the company aware and other purchasers. The food is stored in a dry cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel McGill

customer_reviews.title: My kitten ate this dry food until I introduced her ...
customer_reviews.text: My kitten ate this dry food until I introduced her to wet food. Now she eats only wet food. However, my adult cat, who I try to buy expensive grain-free dry food for, loves the Purina Kitten Chow. I prefer the price of this dry kitten food, and my picky adult cat also approves. With cats, you just have to find what the animal likes!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Johnson

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFUL DIET FOR KITTENS!
customer_reviews.text: This food was purchased to nourish a group of 10 rescued kittens. They feasted on this diet for over 6 weeks, and the result was FABULOUSLY HEALTHY BABIES. I'm so pleased with the results of this product from Purina.
customer_reviews.author: Cookie

customer_reviews.title: Gawd-send for adult cat with stomach issues
customer_reviews.text: One of my cats developed stomach issues and an eating disorder which nearly killed him due to starvation (vet & many expensive tests couldn't find anything wrong). After trying about 50 different cat foods (wet & dry; premium, prescription, & generic), I bought a small bag of this for the high calorie count. To my shock, he ate it... lots of it... without having any stomach issues and now, months later, is a healthy weight again. Other foods still cause him to get sick so this is his primary diet now. It literally saved his life.
customer_reviews.author: LeendaDLL

customer_reviews.title: NOT THE SAME!!!
customer_reviews.text: This IS NOT the Kitten Chow that I have been using for years! I have a couple cats that are under a year old. One of them gets so excited in the evening because this is a bedtime treat. HOWEVER, when I opened this new bag, it is not the same! The kibble is larger and he will not eat it. I believe they have changed the formula and did not tell anybody. To test my theory, I purchased a small box at my drug store ... he, as before, went nuts!
customer_reviews.author: KellyBlock

customer_reviews.title: Hummm..... want to like it better!!!
customer_reviews.text: Okay Nutrition value for sale price. Uncertain taste. Cat often has hairball -green vomitis upon beginning but that might be ? Good ; or ...!?.... then is fine. I increase canned/and water w this by adding ice cubes too it. Might help. Smells baked/very dry dry dry hard kibble. Wish it were pellets & feel purina might do better w it as my cat (kitten)under 1 yr old ~ loves pelleted foods (and those sold out; i grab this)....
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda123

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for all ages!
customer_reviews.text: We currently have 3 indoor cats, 1 senior (about 16 1/2), and 2 kittens. Our senior cat has been losing muscle mass lately due to his old age, and I figured that because kitten food has more protein and fat in it, that it would be better for him to eat. I bought this and I couldn’t be happier. All of our cats took to this food super easily (actually, they go crazy over it!) There’s been no digestive upset, and the pieces are small and easy to swallow (since sometimes our older cat doesn’t like to chew his food). It’s helped my 2 bottle kittens grow and helped our old man stay healthy!
customer_reviews.author: Sara Hubbard

customer_reviews.title: Great Food For My Kitten
customer_reviews.text: This food is great for my kitten, who was about 5 months old when we rescued her from being a stray two months ago. I wanted specifically kitten food until she isn't a kitten anymore, and I like that this is a large bag that will last us quite a while. In fact, there's still quite a lot of the bag left. She's about 7 months old now, and by the time this food runs out, it'll be about time to switch her to regular adult cat food anyway. If you have a kitten, I would definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda M

customer_reviews.title: My adult cats and kittens LOVE this product
customer_reviews.text: I've used Kitten Chow Nurturing formula for years to feed my cats, old and young. It keeps babies healthy, strong, happy with great coats, bright eyes. My cats love the taste too and just shine with health and vigor when on this formula. Other products just fail to give the same results.. This supplier also delivered this huge bag before date of arrival. I am ordering again to keep this supply on hand since getting this product locally has been inconsistent.
customer_reviews.author: cottonswoods

customer_reviews.title: Good for an older cat to nibble
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for a 13 year old cat who lost most of her teeth to stomatitis. She mainly eats soft food but likes to nibble on the dry. She has fewer troubles with this because the pieces are smaller. She usually eats all or most of what I give her. Paid about $14 for 14 POUNDS of this. Someone was selling 18 OUNCES (just over 1 pound) fo $10! Buyer Beware. There are some sellers trying to get $7-$8 for a single 3 ounce can of cat food!
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Giving a good review even though cat allergy
customer_reviews.text: My one cat seems to be experiencing GI symptoms to this food, but my vet informed me they can become allergic to any food at any time. I do not think it has anything to do with quality or ingredients. My other cat does well on it with no issue. Since removing it, my cat with the allergy has had no symptoms. Again, I feel like this was just a fluke. I'm upset I can't use the whole bag unfortunately, but I do not blame Purina. Cats are just, simply, sensitive.
customer_reviews.author: Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Such a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I recently adopted a kitty and she ran out of the food that we got from the shelter. I tried to get the brand they sent her home with but couldn't really afford it at the time. Saw this and it's excellent price/reviews and decided to give it a try. She wouldn't eat it for the first day and I was worried. Now she can't get enough! This is a really huge bag. Much bigger than what I was expecting. Sloan and I are very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Cat Daddy

customer_reviews.title: Something is wrong
customer_reviews.text: Update: most recent, and last, bag purchased has something wrong with it.. bag is leaking an oily liquid all over the floor! I'm afraid it is spoiled, so it will not be going into my kitties. The same product that I was buying at the local grocery store, but a bigger bag at a smaller price. And delivered to my door. Plus, my postal-person has no complaints compared to some of the packages she has to deliver!
customer_reviews.author: BoCoMoMom

customer_reviews.title: For kittens, smelly poop
customer_reviews.text: My mother's two kittens can't keep their faces out of the bag. They love it. The only thing that I would say is that their poop smells really bad. We have to change it daily even with odor eliminator cat litter. This is the only thing they eat and the poop smells is horrible.
customer_reviews.author: A & C

customer_reviews.title: My kittens love this. Favorite food.
customer_reviews.text: My kittens love this. I have read you shouldn't feed them a lot of dry food. I bought grain free dry and it gave them the runs. Switched back to Kitten chow and no problems. This is pretty much the only food my kittens will eat. They are happy, healthy and growing fast. $1 per pound compared to others 3 times the price. I am totally sold on Kitten chow.
customer_reviews.author: Lin K.

customer_reviews.title: Older Picky Cat Approved
customer_reviews.text: The Vet was right - this food is perfect for my older Cat - she loves it and is getting added nutrients. Would recommend to anyone needing to help their cat eat more and get more nutrients in their diet.
customer_reviews.author: S. reviews

customer_reviews.title: I have found that my older cat does so much better on dry food
customer_reviews.text: My kitten is now almost a year old, so I will be switching to adult formula dry cat food. I mix adult and kitten food for my cats. I have found that my older cat does so much better on dry food. She was eating canned food along with the dry and throwing up all over my condo. When I ran out of canned food for a couple of days, she seemed to stop throwing up. Once I stopped giving her the canned food she stopped throwing up altogether, so I will continue with Purina Cat Chow Dry Food.
customer_reviews.author: Leona S Bloomfield

customer_reviews.title: buy these for your kitten !
customer_reviews.text: my 3 month old kitten , seems to be enjoying these so far. He has been having this food for about 1 week now because I just got him a week ago. The bag is big and will last probably for a year ( not sure, I never been a pet owner, just assuming) . The price is reasonable and the expiration date is 2022. Recommended
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great value especially when you subscribe it. I hace two kittens and they both love this dryfood.The male eats can food twice a day as well as they are Norwegian Forest kittens and need more calories. The female so far refuses every kind of can food i try. But she loveskitten chow. I have always used this brand with my cats as babies.
customer_reviews.author: Fatesdestini

customer_reviews.title: Helped my senior CAT gain weight after being too frail.
customer_reviews.text: My vet told me to put my one senior cat who was losing too much weight, after 3 years, all of my picky cats are eating it also.
customer_reviews.author: Skeeter

customer_reviews.title: Good Subscription System for Cat Food
customer_reviews.text: Our kitten seems to like this food fine, although she definitely prefers the wet food that we put on top of it. We are happy to have the option to order this with auto-shipments every two months. Each bag lasts her at least two and a half months, so this makes it easy to keep up with.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia of Broadmoor

customer_reviews.title: Good Price and Good Cat Food
customer_reviews.text: I have a cat that is 3 months old. The cat has been feeding wet food since it was a baby. After three months, the cat started feeding the cat dry food because it said feeding it can help the cat teeth grow. I was worried that the cat would not eat much because it has never eaten dry food. But my cat likes this dry food very much. If I give her wet food that she liked sometimes, she eats only a little and if I give her dry food, she eats everything.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't find in stores!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried finding this in the grocery stores and pet stores, but no one sells it in this large sized bag. I am feeding a few feral kittens. With Winter approaching, I want to be sure they a fattening up the way they couldn't do from ordinary cat food meant for adult cats. Two thumbs up because even lactating mom likes it too!
customer_reviews.author: Julie G72

customer_reviews.title: Good nutrition for kittens
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a donation for a local animal rescue in need. It is complete nutrition for kittens for the first year. It's a good kitten food to use for the money. Yes there are better quality foods out there but there are also lower quality brands as well.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle D

customer_reviews.title: A good, basic food for kittens or underweight adult cats.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for years for kittens, or when my cats begin to lose weight. It is palatable alone or when mixed with another dry food. My cats live long lives, and show no negative effects from eating this simple, basic pet food.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Bea Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Feral cats like it.
customer_reviews.text: Feed to my outdoor cats they like it. No issues. High protein and calories. They eat less of this to maintain their weight than other cheaper giant bags of discount food. Coats shine. Whenever my mom comes over she compliments how healthy my cats look.
customer_reviews.author: J R

customer_reviews.title: 40% protein
customer_reviews.text: Great price and fast delivery and it's 40% protein over the leading brands which are 29 to 34 % protein .
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence  Stone

customer_reviews.title: The best kitten food.
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't find this in my neighborhood stores for some odd reason, but I knew where I could find it. My two kittens absolutely love it. They are healthy and beautiful. They never have issues with their tummies either.
customer_reviews.author: kendra carter

customer_reviews.title: #1 on the Taste Test
customer_reviews.text: Have raised 2 different litters of kittens... tried multiple brands of dry Kitten food and ALL the kittens preferred this brand (Side note: they love it when I add water to their dry food, and think it’s better for them that way also)
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Cats Love It!
customer_reviews.text: I feed a couple of outside cats who, I feel, need extra calories. They just love Purina Kitten Chow-as does one of my two ‘inside’ cats-she gobbles up the crumbs when I put them in their cat tree as a treat!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I used this before my cat had her kittens and afterwards for her and the kittens when the could eat. They loved it! I feel like it gave them the nutrients they needed.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine M. Schillings

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! For the price, I honestly thought it would not be too good since it was so cheap! Boy was I wrong. I called the vet and asked her what to feed 6 week old kittens and she recommended kitten chow. I typed that into amazon and found this. I gave it a try and the kittens are absolutely in love with it. Even the mom was eating it and she does not usually like cat food. We are all so shocked. I recommend it to all of my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Lena Kanaan

customer_reviews.title: Cats love it
customer_reviews.text: I buy this for the feral cats in our neighborhood, starting the late fall to fatten up the cats for the winter and they love it and really puts the weight on them for the cold winters in our area.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Great food
customer_reviews.text: I honestly cannot comment on taste...that is silly. I can say my ultra skinny cat loves it better than a bag of the $50 cat food. Has a high protein quantity and my 8 month old cat loves it also. Will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Hulksmash

customer_reviews.title: But for having delivered to my local animal shelter
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a quality cat food to send to my local pet shelter and this is perfect for that. I have it delivered straight to the shelter Saving everyone the trouble of going out to buy.
customer_reviews.author: BeenThere

customer_reviews.title: Kittens love it
customer_reviews.text: My foster kittens loved this chow and it was easy for them to chew. They put on healthy weight. My adult cat Gatto got into the bag and chowed down. No! No! You have to keep you boyish figure, Gatto!
customer_reviews.author: Karunajyoti

customer_reviews.title: 20 years old and going strong.
customer_reviews.text: She loves the food and is maintaining a good weight. Put her on it at 16 years and she just turned 20 in Jan 2020. Coat hair and nails all in great shape, she doesn't look or act her age. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: DIANE

customer_reviews.title: Cats love it, not a bad price either!
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this! Only one is actually a kitten but both of them love this so much, they actually prefer to eat this than finish off the wet food we give them! Guess that means the flavor must be good 😁
customer_reviews.author: Jesska

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: The kittens love this food. No problem with the item. Delivery driver left package at end of driveway behind a tree. Fortunately we found it before the rain hit or someone made off with the package.
customer_reviews.author: NostalgicGranny

customer_reviews.title: My kittens love!!
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this! My two kittens at the age of three months and one year love this. They have no problems with fur balls and pickiness. It was a huge bag and i think it’ll last us a few months. Recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: heejin jang

customer_reviews.title: Delicious food for my new kittens, 6 weeks old...
customer_reviews.text: My new kittens eat this up! At first I mixed it with water, so it was mushy for their little tummies. Now they have one bowl with dried food to snack on all day, and a dish mixed with little water in am and at night.
customer_reviews.author: Mima

customer_reviews.title: Bought for new kitty
customer_reviews.text: New kitty liked it until she was able to get into the "Big Girl" cat food. Big cats prefer their's to hers. No idea of why. Will find someone with a new kitty or give to a shelter.
customer_reviews.author: animal lover

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs Up
customer_reviews.text: I gave 1 star in the flavor area because it's CAT FOOD... Really????? How do I know what it tastes like. LOL Anyways... the kittens love it and you can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Nonsha

customer_reviews.title: Great kitten food.
customer_reviews.text: My kitten loves it! When I tried other food he stopped eating so back to Purina. My kitten is healthy with a soft coat and all she eats is Purina so I'm assuming it's the food.
customer_reviews.author: ocfatjoe

customer_reviews.title: Great for older cats as well !
customer_reviews.text: Having older cats that need extra vitamins this was the best option . They love the flavor, small pieces , while I enjoy the best price so I can buy mire to help other felines...
customer_reviews.author: Debra Oldfield

customer_reviews.title: Kitties will devour it!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t review the flavor because I don’t personally eat kitten food but I think my two kitties would give it a five. They have no issues eating it! I also spoil them with soft food in the evening!
customer_reviews.author: Skimom

customer_reviews.title: Must be good
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t personally use this. I purchased and had it shipped to my favorite animal rescue because they were in need of kitten food. They said their kittens do best with this food and specifically requested this so it must be good.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive and my cat hasn’t had any health issues.
customer_reviews.text: Only cat food my 15 year old cat has ate for 9 years now. She won’t touch anything else. She hasn’t had any health issues, yet. I think it’s don’t good for her.
customer_reviews.author: Nykee

customer_reviews.title: Kittens/Cats love them!
customer_reviews.text: Got here fast and boxed well. Both the kittens and the cats love them, they won't eat anything else! To buy this locally would be expensive so this price was reasonable. Thank you Purina for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Hart

customer_reviews.title: Our big boy cat Love this
customer_reviews.text: Our big boy Bud cat Loves this food it is kitten chow but they do something he really likes to it. Big bag so not bad on price either. Not sure on these ingredients. But he eats when I get it.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy J Lesieur

customer_reviews.title: Great for young and older cats
customer_reviews.text: I have an older cat that stoped eating due to her teeth and wouldn’t eat can food. I bought this food thinking if a kitten could eat it she may be able. I feel it saved her life!
customer_reviews.author: Roger B.

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: I will be buying these large bags from now on! Worth the price and to get delivered. Lasts much longer than the small store bought bags, no trips to the store for cat food for a couple of months!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Great value fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: After getting grown cat food by accident I ordered this as an emergency order. My fur baby appreciated the fast delivery and the value was great! She’s set on kitten food for a good while now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Our kitten LOVES it!
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't know how the flavor is (I'm not eating it 😂😂) BUT my daughters kitten LOVES this food and begs for it every morning & evening. It also doesn't mess with her digestion, which is a plus!!
customer_reviews.author: KrystleN02

customer_reviews.title: EVERYBODY WAS EATING IT
customer_reviews.text: I HAVE ADULT CATS AS WELL AS KITTENS AND THIS NURTURE IS THE BOMB! I BELIEVE IT HAS MILK BUT ALL OF THE NECESSARY VITAMINS THE KITTENS NEED FOR GROWTH. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS FOOD.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: My kitten was started on nutro which was great but it is the same price for 5 pounds as this 14 pound bag of purina. He had absolutely no problem transitioning to purina. He seems to approve of it, but he is always hungry regardless of what brand of cat food we give him.
customer_reviews.author: Ali S.

customer_reviews.title: Best thing I ever did for my kitties.
customer_reviews.text: Switched to Purina kitten chow. Was feeding with blue Buffalo. Kittens where not thriving. Kittens loved Purina immediately. They look so much better. Price is fantastic. Will continue to purchase Purina foods
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Kittens are happy and really seem to like it it’s about the same price here as it is at Walmart but at least gets delivered to my door which I love
customer_reviews.author: Tonya R.

customer_reviews.title: Kitten chow
customer_reviews.text: My outdoor cats like it, have been feeding them the kitten chow year round to keep weight on them has more protein that regular cat food.
customer_reviews.author: ann

customer_reviews.title: the best
customer_reviews.text: I started feeding this to a cat that had skin issues and his skin and fur is so nice now he is an older cat and they need this extra nutri. for there bodys to stay healthy-- not just for kittens any more. all cats need good nutri.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald W.

customer_reviews.title: Great price value
customer_reviews.text: The pricing was great for the amount of food you get. Unfortunately my kitty doesn’t like too much. He started off eating it ok but then stopped altogether. I now have to mix it with it with wet food to get him to eat it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good priced food
customer_reviews.text: my kitty loves it the only flaw is that it has corn and wheat in it im just trying to finish the bag. I believe in giving my pet good quality food if i eat clean i want my pet to eat clean
customer_reviews.author: Shainah

customer_reviews.title: Dry Kitten Food
customer_reviews.text: I am on Subscribe thing for my Kitten Food. It comes quickly, no hassle, is as described. My two kittens love it and have no problems with it. (digestive, etc) I recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: My kitten has been on this since he started eating dry food and he always eats all of it. He’s a little bit of a picky eater but he loves this stuff. Even my friends cat who is much older tries to get in and steal his food.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Price

customer_reviews.title: best kitten food to send to SAMMIES FRIENDS ANIMAL SHELTER!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for SAMMIES FRIENDS ANIMAL SHELTER, GRASS VALLEY CA. No kill shelter that does a fantastic job and treats the animals in their care so well. Kitten season sees them really needing this product. I hope you look them up at Amazon Smile and send this worthy non profit some cat or dog food, they will love it!
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: The cats love it.
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact it is grain free and the cat with food allergies can eat it. The grown cats seem to prefer the kitten food over their normal dry food.
customer_reviews.author: Michael B. Boles

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: My kittens loved this food. It was easy for them to eat in between their soft canned food meals. My adult cats even ate it when the kittens weren’t near it.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Stinky poop?
customer_reviews.text: My kittens love this dry food. BUT it made their poop so stinky! So I am not buying this again.
customer_reviews.author: Fritzy

customer_reviews.title: Kitten Loves It; Lasts 3 Months
customer_reviews.text: Kitten loves this food and it’s convenient to buy it in bulk and have it delivered to my door. Lasted 3 months for my kitten.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Katz

customer_reviews.title: very happy
customer_reviews.text: great deal at my local supermarket its 5.99 a 3 lbs bag and i just got a 14 lbs bag fro 13.00 im very happy and so are my kittys
customer_reviews.author: Jessica whetstone

customer_reviews.title: Kitty health
customer_reviews.text: I am not a cat so don’t know what the flavor is. I do know my adult cats think it’s great. Hard to keep adults and kitten food separate
customer_reviews.author: Pam Macy

customer_reviews.title: Great for kittens and pregnant or nursing female felines.
customer_reviews.text: This kitten chow is enjoyed energetically by my cats. The benefits appear when I watch them frolicking and looking very beautiful and healthy.
customer_reviews.author: LindaS

customer_reviews.title: Great for new kitten
customer_reviews.text: Have been giving to my kitten and seems to be healthy growing well, will continue till after a year when I’ll start reg cat food!
customer_reviews.author: wendy

customer_reviews.title: Great Affordable Nutrtion!
customer_reviews.text: Use the product for young kittens. Purina is a great brand. Use it for adult cats as Purina Cat Chow Complete.
customer_reviews.author: Maruja R. Bedusa

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Well, I don't personally know about the flavor but my cats like it. It's cheaper to go get it at Wal-Mart but less convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as expected
customer_reviews.text: My kitten loves this food. He won't touch wet food. Arrived packaged well and product was as expected.
customer_reviews.author: CARANA

customer_reviews.title: Kitty LOVES it.
customer_reviews.text: My kitten seems to enjoy. I've never watched her eat as much as she has been. For a small kitten she sure does eat a large amount of this product.
customer_reviews.author: mikelleavell

customer_reviews.title: Donated
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my local humane society. I don't know how well the resident cats like it, but it must be acceptable.
customer_reviews.author: trista franzen

customer_reviews.title: Kitten likes
customer_reviews.text: My kitten likes this food but i wish it was cheaper. My adult cat prefers this food over his food..
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Halsey

customer_reviews.title: Cat likes it fairly well
customer_reviews.text: Cat likes it fairly well. She will eat a little bit along during the day. We feed her canned food at night.
customer_reviews.author: bluejay1959

customer_reviews.title: Great GF Cat food
customer_reviews.text: Even at her old age and her GF Diet my Lola can eat the same food as my kittens; she’s always the first to the dinner table and is fat and happy
customer_reviews.author: Isabel

customer_reviews.title: Have reordered
customer_reviews.text: I mean, I haven't tasted this myself but my cat seems to like this stuff. Eats it well, no vomiting. Like the light colored. Have ordered multiple times
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Smith

customer_reviews.title: Not just for kittens
customer_reviews.text: I have two very old cats. They would obsessively eat their cat chow and throw it up. Our veterinarian suggested giving them kitten chow because it is easier to digest and has more vitamins in it. Plus, we were not worried about the skinny old cats gaining too much weight. It works like a charm. They hardly ever throw up and are pretty active for 18 and 20-year-old cats.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi Makowski

customer_reviews.title: Kittens Love It
customer_reviews.text: Neighborhood momma cats have "adopted" me as the person that will feed their kittens. Of course, I do not mind. ❤ I keep this kitten food available, and they love it.
customer_reviews.author: AG - Texas

customer_reviews.title: Gave to our local humane society
customer_reviews.text: This is what our local humane society uses and I take 1 of these to them each month.
customer_reviews.author: flysunshine

customer_reviews.title: Better than Meow Mix
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this food every time I refill the bowl they come running to eat their food! It’s not bad of a price for high quality healthy food! Way better than Meow mix!
customer_reviews.author: EL PERRO

customer_reviews.title: Bought for a shelter donation
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift to a local shelter through Amazon Smiles. A super easy way to donate to a great charity.
customer_reviews.author: lilangelsmom

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: My kittens love this and its a very good price compared to other retailers. My cats like the taste too.
customer_reviews.author: MadeyClan

customer_reviews.title: big one
customer_reviews.text: I didn't feed my pet with this one. But it is really a big one. I think I can feed him for several months.
customer_reviews.author: mdy

customer_reviews.title: Some love it, some indifferent
customer_reviews.text: Miss Creant (the mother) loves this stuff: the kittens aren't quite so sure, but they'll nibble on it.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Bronson

customer_reviews.title: Nice small kibbles
customer_reviews.text: My rescue kittens like this kibble, as does my old house cat who likes that the kibbles are small.
customer_reviews.author: DesertDawgs

customer_reviews.title: Kittens love it.
customer_reviews.text: I rescue animals and I don't know a single kitten that doesn't like this kitten food. I'm glad they finally have it in a larger bag.
customer_reviews.author: Oahu Wahine

customer_reviews.title: Our kittens love it
customer_reviews.text: Out kittens and our older cats love this food. It is nice small pieces.
customer_reviews.author: MTRanch

customer_reviews.title: Cats like it
customer_reviews.text: My picky 15 yr old cat will even eat this food. The pieces are small enough for him and kitten to eat
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: cats
customer_reviews.text: my kitten likes the adult food and the 10 year old like the kitten food, go figure
customer_reviews.author: jeanne murray

customer_reviews.title: Well loved by my cats
customer_reviews.text: All my kittens love this stuff and even my grown cats prefer this over their food.
customer_reviews.author: yankees86

product_meta.title: Purina Kitten Chow Dry Kitten Food, Nurture - 14 lb. Bag
product_meta.description: Encourage your kitten's healthy appetite when you tempt her taste buds with Purina Kitten Chow Nurture dry kitten food. With each bowlful, your family's newest addition gets essential nutrients like those found in mother's milk to help her grow healthy and strong. She also gets protein, including real chicken, to help support her lean muscle development and her active, playful lifestyle. Because this Kitten Chow Nurture dry kitten food is made with care in our U.S. facilities using high-quality ingredients, you can rest easy knowing she's getting the nutrition she deserves in her dish every day. The delicious recipe gives her the flavor she wants along with a formula made without artificial flavors or colors, so all she tastes is wholesome goodness. Nurture your growing kitten by giving her the 100% complete and balanced nutrition she needs to help her live a long, healthy life with you.
feature_bullets: One (1) 14 lb. Bag - Purina Kitten Chow Dry Kitten Food, Nurture
Contains essential nutrients like those found in mother's milk
DHA helps to support brain and vision development
100% complete and balanced nutrition, formulated for kittens. Calorie Content (fed)-3705 kcal/kg, 414 kcal/cup
